tasks.description:
Search ESPN for Atlanta sports teams playing today and report back.

**Teams to check:**
- Atlanta Hawks (NBA)
- Atlanta Braves (MLB - in season)
- Atlanta Falcons (NFL - in season)
- Atlanta United (MLS - in season)
- Atlanta Dream (WNBA - in season)

**If teams playing:**
- List games with teams and times
- Mention channels if available

**If no games:**
- Send quick message: "No Atlanta teams playing today".

**Purpose:** Test Mission Control workflow.

comments.author: Molty
comments.text: Test task created via chat-first workflow.

comments.author: Molty
comments.text:
RESULTS: No Atlanta teams playing today (Feb 2, 2026). NBA All-Star break approaching, other leagues offseason.

NEXT GAME: Atlanta Hawks @ Miami Heat on Tuesday, Feb 3 at 7:30pm ET.
